translated: The Organization of exporting countries better known as OPEC oil acronym derived from the English Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries is an organization at the intergovernmental level which includes several countries to work together on oil production.
original: L'Organisation des pays exportateurs de pétrole plus connue sous acronyme OPEP dérivé de l'anglais Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries est une organisation à l'échelle intergouvernementale qui regroupe plusieurs pays dans le but de travailler ensemble sur la production de pétrole.
